rdf:Description.dc:title: Proposals for amending the School Act and related legislation 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Education. Policy Advisory Committee for the School Act Review.
Fyfe, Myrna.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Title on cover: Partners in education : principles for a new School Act.

A review of Alberta's system of education being the report of the Policy Advisory Committee for the School Act Reviews. Indicates that, generally speaking, Alberta's system of education is sound and much of the paper is a restatement of the existing system.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Education
Educational law and legislation
